doc:
Maurice Mariaud https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Mariaud 0 Maurice Mariaud (1875–1958) was a French silent film director, actor and screenwriter. He was best known for his silent films of the 1910s and his work overlapping with Portuguese film in the early 1920s, notably the 1922 Portuguese film Os Faroleiros. Maurice_Mariaud ( 1875 – 1958 ) was a_French_silent_film_director , actor_and_screenwriter . He was_best_known for his_silent_films of the_1910s and his_work overlapping with Portuguese_film in the_early_1920s , notably the_1922_Portuguese_film_Os_Faroleiros .
